document.full_text: the long-awaited approval of women's ski jumping for the 2014 sochi winter olympics now looks a formality, ski federation head gian franco kasper said on tuesday.
document.title: women's ski jumping set for sochi, says fis head
lines_and_colors: the long-awaited approval of women's ski jumping for the 2014 sochi winter olympics now looks a formality, ski federation head gian franco kasper said on tuesday.
